goal:
Eurometaux is the organisation set up by the European non-ferrous metals industry to serve its members in matters related to EU and international legislation development and implementation. In case of necessity, it represents its interest in EU and international related activities.
Through environmental and technical expertise, economic analysis, scientific research, sharing of best practices, public affairs and communication activities, it aims to promote metals' contribution to sustainable development, facilitate members' understanding and implementation of EU legislation (for example REACH) and convey the views of the sector to EU and international institutions in matters of relevance to the industry.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Institutional affairs, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Policy developments concerning Environment, Health, Energy, Climate Change, Sustainability, Trade, Industrial Policy
